Name: Chrysanthemum
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Herbal and aromatic, this benefits from the dilution that comes with a good long stir.
History: The Chrysanthemum appears in Hugo R. Ensslin's 1917 Recipes for Mixed Drinks (and may well have been in his 1916 First Edition).
Nutrition: One serving of Chrysanthemum contains 112 calories
